channel.title: minIO on 打工人日志
channel.description: Recent content in minIO on 打工人日志

item.title: 安装 minIO Azure S3网关
item.description: 安装 minIO 通过 docker 安装 docker run -p 9000:9000 -p 41863:41863 -d --name azure-s3 \ -e "MINIO_ACCESS_KEY=azure存储账户" \ -e "MINIO_SECRET_KEY=azure存储密码" \ minio/minio gateway azure --console-address ":41863" 通过 docker-compose 安装 version: "3" services: minio: image: "minio/minio:RELEASE.2022-01-04T07-41-07Z.fips" container_name: "minio" restart: "always" volumes: - "/etc/localtime:/etc/localtime" ports: - "9000:9000" - "9001:9001" environment: - "MINIO_ROOT_USER=azure存储账户" - "MINIO_ROOT_PASSWORD=azure存储密码" command: - --console-address ":41863"
